page.title: 16Reminders of the past
page.content: One of the most interesting things that has stayed constant over the years,has been the in which the {Population}has tended to stay within this same area.When we did a survey,we found that most of the{families}were able to say that their relatives had lived in the district for as long as they could remember.Indeed when we looked at some{local records}we kept on coming across the same family names over and over again. Many of the local place names also give reminders of the past.for instance{Tollgate,}which marks the sight where the tolls were paid,and the{Green}which has seen public hangings and the burning of witches. Even today many families find that they tend to stay within the area,some thought that it was the close connection with the sea.
